sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.RNUM, A.FREE_NUM, A.FREE_TITLE, A.FREE_DATE, A.FREE_LOOKUP, A.FREE_PICTURE, A.MEM_NO FROM (SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_DATE DESC) AS RNUM,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_DATE DESC) AS RNUM,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_DATE ASC) AS RNUM,
FREE_NUM, FREE_TITLE,TO_CHAR(FREE_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'||' '||'HH24:MI:SS') AS FREE_DATE , FREE_LOOKUP, FREE_PICTURE, MEM_NO FROM FREEBOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND DELETE_NUM = 0
AND FREE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #SearchContent# || '%'
AND FREE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #SearchContent# || '%'
AND MEM_NO LIKE '%' || #SearchContent# || '%'
)A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #start# AND #end#

SELECT A.RNUM, A.FREEBOARD_NUM, A.FREEBOARD_CONTENT, A.MEMBER_NUM, A.FREE_DATE, A.FREEREPLE_NUM FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREEREPLE_NUM DESC) AS RNUM, FREEREPLE_NUM, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NUM, FREEBOARD_NUM, TO_CHAR(REPLE_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'||' '||'HH24:MI:SS') AS FREE_DATE FROM FREEREPLE WHERE 1 = 1 AND FREEBOARD_NUM = #testNo# AND REPLE_DELETE = 0 )A WHERE 1=1
AND A.RNUM BETWEEN #start# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FREEBOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND DELETE_NUM = 0
AND FREE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #SearchContent# || '%'
AND FREE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #SearchContent# || '%'
AND MEM_NO LIKE '%' || #SearchContent# || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FREEREPLE WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM = #testNo# AND REPLE_DELETE = 0

SELECT A.RNUM,A.FREE_NUM, A.FREE_TITLE, A.FREE_CONTENT, A.FREE_DATE, A.MEM_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_NUM DESC) AS RNUM, FREE_NUM, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(FREE_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'||' '||'HH24:MI:SS') AS FREE_DATE , MEM_NO FROM FREEBOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND DELETE_NUM = 0 )A WHERE A.FREE_NUM = #testNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD(FREE_NUM, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT,FREE_DATE, MEM_NO) VALUES(FREEBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #FreeBoardTitle#, #FreeBoardContent#, SYSDATE, #sId#)
INSERT INTO FREEREPLE(FREEREPLE_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, FREEBOARD_NUM, REPLE_DATE, FREEBOARD_CONTENT) VALUES(FREEREPLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #sId#, #testNo#, SYSDATE, #FreeRepleContent#)

UPDATE FREEBOARD SET FREE_LOOKUP = FREE_LOOKUP+1 WHERE FREE_NUM = #testNo#
UPDATE FREEBOARD SET DELETE_NUM = 1 WHERE FREE_NUM = #testNo#
